feed.title: Trackly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Trackly: Version 1.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump typing-extensions from 4.9.0 to 4.12.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/pull/5
  • Bump croniter from 2.0.1 to 5.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/pull/4
  • Bump python-dotenv from 1.0.0 to 1.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/pull/3
  • Bump requests from 2.31.0 to 2.32.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/pull/2
  • Bump requests from 2.31.0 to 2.32.2 in the pip group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/pull/1

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/pull/5

Full Changelog: https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/compare/v0.2.3...v1.0.0

entry.title: New release for Trackly: Version 1.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Discord notifcation on first time startup of the container
  • Discord notifications for the completion of a scan (optional)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

entry.title: New release for Trackly: Version 1.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Reduced the wait interval in between discord notifications to 8 minutes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

entry.title: New release for Trackly: Version 1.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added a comprehensive multi-page web interface
  • Reworked backend architecture for better reliability
  • Made Discord notifications optional for more flexibility
  • Refreshed app icon with a modern design
  • Updated dependencies to latest stable versions

New Contributors

  • @7eventy7 made their first contribution in https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/pull/8

Full Changelog: https://github.com/7eventy7/trackly/compare/v1.0.2...v1.1.0
